summary: Two men exploring the Louisiana swamps encounter a Bigfoot-type creature.
cast: Jack Elam|Dub Taylor|Dennis Fimple|John David Carson|Bill Thurman|Jim McCullough Jr.|Roy Tatum|Cathryn Hartt|Becky Smiser|Michelle Willingham|Evelyn Hindricks|Roger Pancake|Karen Brooks|Chase Tatum|Bob Kyle|Joy N. Houck Jr.|I.M. 'Buddy' Brumley Jr.
title: La criatura del lago negro
